scripts.preinstall: npm i -g gulp gulp-rimraf gulp-cache gulp-size gulp-concat gulp-jade gulp-minify-css gulp-jshint gulp-less less-plugin-autoprefix gulp-base64 gulp-rename gulp-imagemin gulp-uglify gulp-notify browserify babelify babel-preset-es2015 browser-sync event-stream vinyl-source-stream gulp-sourcemaps
scripts.postinstall: npm link gulp gulp-rimraf gulp-cache gulp-size gulp-concat gulp-jade gulp-minify-css gulp-jshint gulp-less less-plugin-autoprefix gulp-base64 gulp-rename gulp-imagemin gulp-uglify gulp-notify browserify babelify babel-preset-es2015 browser-sync event-stream vinyl-source-stream gulp-sourcemaps
scripts.prepare: npm run preinstall && npm run postinstall
